name: productboard
description: Web platform for collaborative product design

scripts.start: docker-compose -f ./compositions/production.yml up -d && workspaces-run --parallel --ignore="productboard-{common,database,toolkit}" -- npm run start
scripts.devel: docker-compose -f ./compositions/development.yml up -d && workspaces-run --parallel --ignore="productboard-{common,database,toolkit}" -- npm run devel
scripts.toolkit-start: docker-compose -f ./compositions/production.yml up -d && workspaces-run --only="productboard-toolkit" -- npm run start
scripts.toolkit-devel: docker-compose -f ./compositions/production.yml up -d && workspaces-run --only="productboard-toolkit" -- npm run devel
